summary: User timeline_15 documents recovery from severe depression, including setbacks and ultimate progress.

posts.text: Feel like I don't deserve to be loved. I'm tired of existing I gave up trying My partner has been incredibly supportive. went for a walk to clear my head Learning to accept help and love. I'm being patient with myself
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I can't do anything right I'm worthless. I can't get out of bed anymore Did one small thing today - made my bed. took my medication as prescribed Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Had a really bad day after weeks of progress. I'm disgusting I stopped taking my medication Using my coping skills instead of old habits. did some self-care activities This setback doesn't erase my progress. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The urges to self-harm are strong. I feel completely hopeless I can't get out of bed anymore Using the distraction techniques I learned. did some self-care activities Reached out to my crisis support instead. I'm worth the effort
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I have no reason to keep going I'm spiraling out of control Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. asked for support Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I hate myself so much Back to square one. I pushed everyone away Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. reached out for help Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I feel empty inside Back to square one. I'm losing my mind Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. went for a walk to clear my head Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I hate myself so much I isolated myself from all my friends Called my psychiatrist first. went for a walk to clear my head We're trying a different medication instead. I'm committed to my recovery
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I'm broken beyond repair My performance has been terrible. I'm failing at everything Met with HR about accommodations. wrote in my journal They're being supportive. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I can't do anything right I'm worthless. I gave up trying Did one small thing today - made my bed. did some self-care activities Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
